scripts.cap:build: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.build:apk: npm run build && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync && cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -archivePath build/App.xcarchive archive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath build/App.xcarchive -exportPath build/ipa -exportOptionsPlist ExportOptions.plist && cd ../..
